# uptime_integration_librato (Resource)

Librato integration resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptime_integration_librato" "example" {
  name        = "My Librato Integration"
  email       = "user@example.com"
  api_token   = "your-librato-api-token"
  metric_name = "uptime.response_time"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) Librato API token
- `email` (String) Librato account email
- `metric_name` (String) Name of the metric to send data to
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `contact_groups` (Set of String) List of contact group names to receive notifications. 
Each contact group can contain multiple contacts (email addresses, phone numbers, or integrations) 
that will be notified when alerts are triggered. Defaults to ['Default'] if not specified.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `url` (String)
